scripts.pwd-start: npm run unmigrate; npm run migrate; while true do sleep 60;
scripts.package:build: npx tsc --project tsconfig.json && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:unbuild: rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts && (cd ./migrations && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts) && (cd ./imports && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts) && (cd ./imports/gql && rm -f ./*.js; rm -f ./*.js.map; rm -f ./*.d.ts)
scripts.package:publish: npm run package:build; npm publish --access public; npm run package:unbuild
scripts.hasura-docker: (export JWT_SECRET='{"type":"HS256", "key": "3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R"}'; export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); (export DOCKERHOST=$(ifconfig | grep -E "([0-9]{1,3}\.){3}[0-9]{1,3rep -v 127.0.0.1 | awk '{ print $2 }' | cut -f2 -d: | head -n1); cd ./node_modules/@deepcase/hasura/local; docker-compose up -d))
